skins.shipDescription: Omaha-class light cruiser - Richmond, Hull Number CL-9!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Richmond of the Omaha-class. Because I'm an old model, I was mainly tasked with things like escorts and transport. Although my performance is nothing to brag about, you can say that I've seen a lot of action! Feel free to ask me anything whenever you have questions~!
skins.acquisition: Hi! Are you the commander? That's great~! I'm Richmond. Hit me up whenever you feel like~!
skins.login: Commander, did you do anything interesting while you were away for so long? You should bring me along next time~!
skins.details: Commander, do you need anything? You can always chat with me if you're free.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, you've got something on your lips... Got it!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'd love to be able to see everyone from all over the world~!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Lots of my sisters have survived through this war. Impressive, right?
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you like getting physical too, Commander?
